mapper.insert: INSERT INTO netflix.`user` (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, USER_SIGNUP_DATE, USER_DEL_DATE) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, USER_SIGNUP_DATE, USER_DEL_DATE FROM netflix.`user` WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw} AND COMMON_NO = '101'
SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, USER_SIGNUP_DATE, USER_DEL_DATE FROM netflix. `user` WHERE COMMON_NO = 102 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
